title: Where are my photos and videos saved by default? Can I change the save location?
answer:
On the viewfinder, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109339) in the upper right corner of the screen, then ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109340) to display the settings menu, touch Preferred save location, and then select the microSD card or phone's internal storage as the preferred save location. 

 When the save location is the microSD card, you can touch Files > Local > SD card > DCIM > Camera to view your photos and videos. 

 [When the save location is your phone's internal storage, you can touch Files > Local > Internal storage > DCIM > Camera to view your photos and videos.]()
